mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user (username, sex, email, phone, password, SDUId, major, permission, nation, ethnic, politicsStatus) VALUES
(#{user.username}, #{user.sex}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone}, #{user.password}, #{user.SDUId}, #{user.major}, #{user.permission}, #{user.nation}, #{user.ethnic}, #{user.politicsStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.sex, u.SDUId, u.major, s.grade, st.status, st.section FROM user u LEFT JOIN status st ON u.id = st.id LEFT JOIN section s ON st.section = s.id WHERE ( u.SDUId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) AND u.permission = #{permission} LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
